thread.title: Kim Chappell
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Kim Chappell

author: Kim Chappell
title: Kim Chappell
text:
We absolutely love the pens and Kelly and Kylie were so great to work with! I will definitely recommend this company to my peers! Thanks again for the amazing pens and outstanding customer service! I look forward to ordering again in the near future.
Kim Chappell
